FullDescription: VerAI is committed to accelerating the global zero-carbon transformation by discovering the minerals essential for our sustainable future.  We are disrupting Mining and Mineral Exploration by deploying a revolutionary Artificial Intelligence Platform that detects concealed mineral deposits in the vast underexplored covered terrain. With VerAI’s AI-driven approach, which incorporates machine learning searching capabilities in geophysics data, previously concealed mineral deposits can now be detected at a rate of two orders of magnitude more effectively than human-centric techniques. With its deep partner ecosystem, VerAI accelerates the ability to leverage these vital mineral deposits to help lead the green-energy transition into a more sustainable future.  VerAI Management, Board of Directors, Advisors, and technical groups fuse unique practices and experiences into an outstanding discovery team. Our team combines sophisticated Defense Intelligence search & find methodologies with the best practices of mineral exploration and novel cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions.

BluWave-ai is dedicated to working with partners and customers toward universal, affordable, and sustainable energy and transportation systems.  BluWave-ai’s grid energy optimization platform balances the cost, availability, and reliability of different energy sources - renewable and non-renewable - with energy demand in real time. They are focused on supporting distribution utility, enterprise, mining, campus, net zero community, and remote/off-grid clients around the globe.

FullDescription: SmaSS revolutionizes the CV&AI market by greatly simplifying the process of deploying ready-made apps or creating new ones. We are working to launch any app, whether it's Loss prevention solutions for retail or Facial Recognition for security, would be as easy as installing a new app in your phone. We are confident this will help our customers save significant money (up to 10 times) and time, allowing them to focus on solving the main tasks of their business. We had to go a long way to prove that our team and EDGE computing are capable of many things. In 2019, we implemented a Seamless Store MVP based only on our EDGE cameras. No servers were required. Many doubts and misunderstandings were dispelled around the EDGE direction after we showed our developments several times at global retail exhibitions.  Now we have set a new big goal (AppStore for CV&AI apps) and intend to complete it by Q1 2022 with large global companies from different business areas in our client portfolio.

FullDescription: Quick Safety is a proactive RegTech IT/Software development company focused on solving the issues around compliance of any type in any industry. We’ve just chosen the electrical industry as our foundation due to first-hand experience by Kurt Alexander, founder. Electrical compliance oversight is non-existent. Preventative measures for electrical power faults/failures/electrocutions, and fires are non-existent. (As a Nuclear Submarine veteran, I know that preventative is MUCH better than reactionary). We must be able to predict/prevent this, and tighten up the validation, transparency, and oversight of electrical testing. At Quick Safety, we are doing that and more! We have developed a fully certified Government Standards products, approved by electrical regulators, for the removing the risk from all users – Electricians, Electrical Contractors, Asset Owners, and Insurance Companies (Residential all the way to Oil & Gas). Commercial product released in Australia and New Zealand (2019 and 2022), Currently working with South African Government, then European Union, UK, MENA and USA. If Notre Dame was using Quick Safety – it would have NEVER caught fire. (Fact)

FullDescription: For enterprises that work with a lot of 'unstructured' data like documents, presentations, emails, and webpages, a mash-up of existing search tools provides endless, irrelevant links and no answers, Nesh is the solution. Nesh isn't a search engine, it's the answer engine. Nesh is an always learning, hyper-focused, domain-based answer engine designed to find answers that matter instead of links to documents. Nesh is like a combination of Google’s search, IBM Watson’s domain understanding, and Alexa’s conversations tailored for your industry, based on your company. FullDescription: We are a technology company focused on advanced analytics and AI for businesses across industries. We have decades of experience in Metals and Mining, Pulp and Paper, Rail, Chemicals, Food and Beverage, and others. Our flagship product, SIENTIA, is a data analytics platform that helps companies integrate industry data, develop business intelligence and predictive models, and pave the way for AI systems. Additionally, we offer various related services, including consulting, industry 4.0, process control optimization, advanced analytics, and AI. Our headquarters are located in Miami, and we are proud to have operations in Brazil, where we have established a strong presence in the market and have a dedicated team of experts who understand the unique needs of businesses in the region. With our global reach and expertise, we can help businesses of all sizes and industries transform their operations, optimize their processes, and unlock new opportunities for growth and success. At the core of our business is a commitment to innovation and excellence. We are constantly pushing the boundaries of what is possible with advanced analytics, AI, and related technologies, and we are always looking for new ways to help our clients achieve their goals. Whether you want to streamline your operations, optimize your supply chain, or develop new products and services, we have the expertise and tools you need to succeed. Our team of experts includes data scientists, software engineers, and business consultants, all with years of experience in their respective fields. We pride ourselves on our ability to work closely with our clients, providing personalized solutions tailored to their unique needs and objectives. With our deep industry knowledge, technical expertise, and strategic approach, we can deliver results that help our clients stay ahead of the competition and achieve their goals.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Mining, Precious Metals
FullDescription: StratumAI is the mining industry drills narrow holes in the ground called drill holes to identify how much gold is in the ground at any spot. These holes are expensive so the industry uses statistical interpolation to predict what's in between these holes. Stratum replaces these traditional methods by utilizing deep learning to better predict both where to best drill and how much gold is in between these holes. This technology is not limited to gold and has been demonstrated to work on other metals, including base metals like copper. Based on Stratum's current pilots, our technology is projected to create ~10M in annual value for the average mine.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Construction, Fleet Management, Internet of Things, Mining
FullDescription: COSMOS is an AI-based, cloud-native software designed to optimize fuel consumption and reduce emissions in the heavy transport sector. By ingesting data from the telematics systems of hauling trucks, COSMOS can predict and optimize fuel consumption in real-time, while monitoring operator behavior that can lead to over-consumption and identifying anomalous usage. Using advanced algorithms that enhance and clarify GPS data, COSMOS can generate fuel savings of up to 10%. This technology provides operators with the tools to make informed decisions that reduce waste, improve efficiency, and lower their environmental impact. COSMOS represents an important step towards a more sustainable future for heavy transport. By leveraging cutting-edge AI technology, we can address the critical challenges facing this sector and help reduce its carbon footprint.

FullDescription: Mechmine, an Industry 4.0 company, is setting the possibilities with predictive maintenance to new heights. The health of a rotating machine (motors, gears, drives, pumps, vents, generators, ...) can be measured best by means of vibration. Combining technologies from artificial intelligence (AI), IoT/LTE/5G, big-data, Cloud and MEMS enable Condition Monitoring and Predictive Maintenance. We analyze vibrations from bearings and gearboxes and predict their remaining useful life. Smart condition monitoring of rotating machines through tele-monitoring for maintenance & lifetime prognosis. Our system is fast scalable. Mechmine serves B2B, B2C and diagnostic service customers. Mechmine produces its own cost effective HW to ensure data quality standards can be met.

FullDescription: Mnemotrix Systems is an information mining, aggregation, and predictive analytics services company.They provide Intelligence Amplifiers, or machine augmented intelligence, designed to support human Sensemaking, to retrofit existing data fusion systems, in a remarkably different way. Trained analysts and researchers can obtain new knowledge and extract hidden connections from the massive amounts of information from which they must produce useful analyses. They build and host custom Intelligent Software Agents which at the core are driven by SISMATM (Savant Intelligence Servo Mechanical Automaton/Agent) focusing mainly on applications in science, technology, economic forecasting, business, and world literature, hosting these custom applications in a shared multi-media secure environment, providing Middleware Solutions in a variety of platforms. They also on a case-by-case custom basis, mine and fuse content-rich textual materials that contain photos, maps, and diagrams into geographical information system (GIS) interfaces, providing a multiplicity of data resources for all kinds of contingency studies, strategic planning and development, mapping, and spatial analysis. They call this Smart GeoData-Referencing. They have merged intelligence amplification and artificial intelligence methodology with dynamic spatial analysis and mapping, opening the door to an entirely new approach to critical analysis and planning. At the forefront of mission critical intelligent information technology and strategic computing applications since 1986, they create and maintain upstream detection research environments which support experts who must remain in the decision-making loop, a complex forecasting and problem-solving capability.
